title: CockroachDB 2.0 Performance Makes Significant Strides
description:
[For CockroachDB's most up-to-date performance benchmarks, please read our Performance Overview page]
Correctness, stability, and performance are the foundations of CockroachDB. We've invested tremendous resources into correctness and stability. Today, performance takes the spotlight as we will be publishing benchmarked metrics that demonstrate that you can achieve correctness, stability, and excellent performance within the same database.
So how does CockroachDB define performance? On which type of queries does CockroachDB perform well?

title: How to make GIFs with FFMPEG
description: INTRODUCTION To follow along, download media files here: https://github.com/cyburgee/ffmpeg-guide If you’ve worked with media encoding in the past decade it’s likely that you’ve come across FFmpeg.
